Wisdom: رُبَّ سَاعٍ سَرِيعٌ نَجَا وَطَالِبٌ بَطِي‏ءٌ رَجَا
enWisdom: It may be that he who strives and acts quickly is saved [and succeeds] while the slow seeker [only] hopes [to attain it in the future]
One who is diligent becomes fortunate
Striving has been linked to achievement
One who strives for correctness becomes successful
Whoever embarks upon [any action with] diligence, overpowers his opponent
One who tries to overcome his adversary has embarked on a struggle
One who employs diligence arrives at his goal

Wisdom: مَنْ بَذَلَ جُهْدَ طَاقَتِهِ بَلَغَ كُنْهَ إِرَادَتِهِ
enWisdom: One who strives with all his effort arrives at the core of his desired objective

Wisdom: مَنْ طَلَبَ شَيْئاً نَالَهُ أَوْ بَعْضَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever seeks a thing achieves it, or part of it

Wisdom: مَا أَقْرَبَ النَّجَاحَ مِمَّنْ عَجَّلَ السَّرَاحَ
enWisdom: How close is success to one who is quick to release [and send forth his provisions for the Hereafter]
